snippet.title: Mother of All Secrets Reveal Trailer | From the team behind The Life and Suffering of Sir Brante
snippet.description:
Sever studio and 101XP are happy to present new a new project Mother of All Secrets!

Mother of All Secrets is a mystery RPG about an orphanage where one's fate changes with every tick of the clock. As one of the young wards, uncover the House's secrets by influencing its dwellers' minds, hearts, and plans, and survive for 14 days that will reshape your soul. Survive for 14 days that will reshape your soul forever.

Add to your Steam wishlist: https://link.101xp.com/MoSYoutubeEN

Join us on Discord https://discord.gg/KPwhnJsJDr
